author: Laura Stevens
title: Amazon Studies Body Sizes to Get That Perfect Clothing Fit
text:
Amazon.com Inc. wants to understand one of the more intimate things about you: body size.
The online retailer is inviting people to an office in New York to measure small changes in size and shape over the course of 20 weeks. Those chosen via a survey to participate in the 10, bimonthly visits will receive Amazon gift cards worth up to $250, according to an invitation reviewed by The Wall Street Journal.
